people.name: Thomas Varghese
people.description: Patriarch of the family. Taught Malayalam literature for 35 years at St. Thomas High School. Known for his love of poetry and traditional Kerala Christian hymns.

people.name: Mary Thomas
people.description: Matriarch of the family. Expert in traditional Kerala Christian cuisine. Active member of the church choir for over 40 years.

people.name: George Thomas
people.description: Eldest son. Moved to the US in 2005 for higher studies. Works at a tech company in Silicon Valley. Maintains strong ties to Kerala culture and visits home annually.

people.name: Sarah George
people.description: Married to George in 2008. Originally from Thrissur. Practices medicine in the Bay Area and volunteers at community health clinics.

people.name: Anna Thomas
people.description: Second child. Specializes in sustainable architecture. Has been working in the Middle East since 2010. Designs eco-friendly buildings and urban spaces.

people.name: Jacob Mathew
people.description: Married to Anna in 2005. From Ernakulam. Works on major infrastructure projects in the UAE. Passionate about Kerala's traditional architecture.

people.name: Paul Thomas
people.description: Youngest son. Runs a family clinic in Kottayam. Chose to stay in Kerala to serve the local community. Active in church activities and medical camps.

people.name: Rachel Paul
people.description: Married to Paul in 2010. Works alongside him at the family clinic. Known for her compassionate care and dedication to patients.

people.name: Thomas George
people.description: Eldest grandchild. High school student interested in computer science and robotics. Learning Malayalam and enjoys visiting Kerala during summer vacations.

people.name: Maria George
people.description: Second grandchild. Middle school student who loves art and music. Takes Bharatanatyam classes and is learning to play the violin.

people.name: David Jacob
people.description: Third grandchild. Elementary school student. Bilingual in English and Malayalam. Loves soccer and swimming.

people.name: Esther Jacob
people.description: Fourth grandchild. Kindergarten student. Enjoys drawing and storytelling. Loves listening to her grandmother's stories about Kerala.

people.name: John Paul
people.description: Fifth grandchild. High school student planning to study medicine. Helps at his parents' clinic during school breaks. Active in youth ministry.

people.name: Grace Paul
people.description: Youngest grandchild. Middle school student who excels in academics. Loves reading and participates in church choir like her great-grandmother.
